name: 真田丸 乱舞
description:
Became Sanada Yukimura, destroy the approaching Tokugawa army!
Let's experience the Osaka summer camp.

Squeezing Tokugawa soldiers surround you.
Let's defeat enemy soldiers approaching from front and back and from left and right.
If you kill a certain number, you will move to boss fight.
In the boss game, attack and defensive mind will be displayed, so let's hit the viewpoint (marker) quickly.

By destroying the boss of each stage,
Masamaru Sanada Maruten will be available for viewing.
In Sanada Maru Warlord Legend, you can see the history of each military commander who also came to history.
